display_html:
data ScriptLookups a = ScriptLookups {
  • slTxOutputs :: Map TxOutRef DecoratedTxOut
  • slOtherScripts :: Map ScriptHash (Versioned Script)
  • slOtherData :: Map DatumHash Datum
  • slPaymentPubKeyHashes :: Set PaymentPubKeyHash
  • slTypedValidator :: Maybe (TypedValidator a)
  • slOwnPaymentPubKeyHash :: Maybe PaymentPubKeyHash
  • slOwnStakingCredential :: Maybe StakingCredential
}
name: ScriptLookups ScriptLookups slTxOutputs slOtherScripts slOtherData slPaymentPubKeyHashes slTypedValidator slOwnPaymentPubKeyHash slOwnStakingCredential

display_html:
data SomeLookupsAndConstraints where
  • SomeLookupsAndConstraints :: forall a. (FromData (DatumType a), ToData (DatumType a), ToData (RedeemerType a)) => ScriptLookups a -> TxConstraints (RedeemerType a) (DatumType a) -> SomeLookupsAndConstraints
name: SomeLookupsAndConstraints SomeLookupsAndConstraints

display_html:
data UnbalancedTx
  • = UnbalancedEmulatorTx {
    • unBalancedEmulatorTx :: Tx
    • unBalancedTxRequiredSignatories :: Set PaymentPubKeyHash
    • unBalancedTxUtxoIndex :: Map TxOutRef TxOut
    }
  • | UnbalancedCardanoTx {
    • unBalancedCardanoBuildTx :: CardanoBuildTx
    • unBalancedTxUtxoIndex :: Map TxOutRef TxOut
    }
name: UnbalancedTx UnbalancedEmulatorTx UnbalancedCardanoTx unBalancedEmulatorTx unBalancedTxRequiredSignatories unBalancedTxUtxoIndex unBalancedCardanoBuildTx

display_html: mkTx :: (FromData (DatumType a), ToData (DatumType a), ToData (RedeemerType a)) => Params -> ScriptLookups a -> TxConstraints (RedeemerType a) (DatumType a) -> Either MkTxError UnbalancedTx
name: mkTx

display_html:
data TxConstraints i o = TxConstraints {
  • txConstraints :: [TxConstraint]
  • txConstraintFuns :: TxConstraintFuns
  • txOwnInputs :: [ScriptInputConstraint i]
  • txOwnOutputs :: [ScriptOutputConstraint o]
}
name: TxConstraints TxConstraints txConstraints txConstraintFuns txOwnInputs txOwnOutputs

display_html:
data TxConstraint
  • = MustIncludeDatumInTxWithHash DatumHash Datum
  • | MustIncludeDatumInTx Datum
  • | MustValidateInTimeRange !(ValidityInterval POSIXTime)
  • | MustBeSignedBy PaymentPubKeyHash
  • | MustSpendAtLeast Value
  • | MustProduceAtLeast Value
  • | MustSpendPubKeyOutput TxOutRef
  • | MustSpendScriptOutput TxOutRef Redeemer (Maybe TxOutRef)
  • | MustUseOutputAsCollateral TxOutRef
  • | MustReferenceOutput TxOutRef
  • | MustMintValue MintingPolicyHash Redeemer TokenName Integer (Maybe TxOutRef)
  • | MustPayToAddress Address (Maybe (TxOutDatum Datum)) (Maybe ScriptHash) Value
  • | MustSatisfyAnyOf [[TxConstraint]]
name: TxConstraint MustIncludeDatumInTxWithHash MustIncludeDatumInTx MustValidateInTimeRange MustBeSignedBy MustSpendAtLeast MustProduceAtLeast MustSpendPubKeyOutput MustSpendScriptOutput MustUseOutputAsCollateral MustReferenceOutput MustMintValue MustPayToAddress MustSatisfyAnyOf

display_html:
data ScriptInputConstraint a = ScriptInputConstraint {
  • icRedeemer :: a
  • icTxOutRef :: TxOutRef
  • icReferenceTxOutRef :: Maybe TxOutRef
}
name: ScriptInputConstraint ScriptInputConstraint icRedeemer icTxOutRef icReferenceTxOutRef

display_html:
data ScriptOutputConstraint a = ScriptOutputConstraint {
  • ocDatum :: TxOutDatum a
  • ocValue :: Value
  • ocReferenceScriptHash :: Maybe ScriptHash
}
name: ScriptOutputConstraint ScriptOutputConstraint ocDatum ocValue ocReferenceScriptHash
